slides.title: HTML Document Structure
slides.description: Basic template every HTML page follows:
slides.code:
<‎!DOCTYPE html‎>
<‎html‎>
<‎head‎>
  <‎title‎>My Page<‎/title‎>
<‎/head‎>
<‎body‎>
  <‎h1‎>Hello World!<‎/h1‎>
  <‎p‎>My first web page.<‎/p‎>
<‎/body‎>
<‎/html‎>
slides.footer: This simple structure powers billions of web pages
